item.title: Take part in sports to reduce stress, says Raichur Zilla Panchayat CEO
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur Zilla Panchayat Chief Executive Officer Iswar Kumar Kandoo has said that participating in any sport would help to develop physical fitness and strength, and also help to reduce stress.
He was addressing the audience after inaugurating a sports and cultural event to mark the celebrations of RDPR Utsav held at the sports stadium on the campus of the University of Agriculture Science in Raichur on February 24.
Mr. Kandoo reiterated that government employees must take part in sports to red...]]>
